ingredients: 1 tbsp cold-pressed, extra virgin olive oil, plus more for drizzling
1 pinch salt and pepper, to taste
210 g (7.4oz) chopped kale, thick stems remove
25 ml (0.9fl oz) water, at room temperature
5 tsp cold-pressed, extra virgin olive oil
500 g (17.6oz) all-purpose flour, plus more as needed
